data.title: Roanoke Blacksburg Regional Airport
data.meta_description: Learn more about the Roanoke Valley's air travel options, airlines, car rentals, shuttles, baggage fees, and more.
data.text:
Air service to the Roanoke Region in Virginia's Blue Ridge is available through the Roanoke-Blacksburg Regional Airport, which offers direct flights to eight international airports through the hubs of American Airlines, Delta, United Airlines, and Allegiant Air.

Airport Information

Roanoke-Blacksburg Regional Airport

5202 Aviation Drive NW

Roanoke, VA 24012

Phone: 540.362.1999

Website: flyroa.com

Domestic and International Gateways

Atlanta (ATL)

Charlotte (CLT)

Chicago/O'Hare (ORD)

NYC/LaGuardia (LGA)

Orlando/Sanford (SFB)

Philadelphia (PHL)

St. Petersburg/Clearwater (PIE)

Washington/Dulles (IAD)

Direct flights are available to eight international hubs with one-stop service to over 70 international cities and over 400 domestic destinations with over 40 daily scheduled flights.

The airport offers complimentary wi-fi internet, multiple cafes with a variety of food and beverages - including freshly-made items or pre-packaged meals and snacks, and Hudson News stores for any last-minute travel needs.

The Roanoke-Blacksburg Regional Airport is located within five miles (less than a 10-minute drive) of Downtown Roanoke and is surrounded by a variety of accommodations and attractions. Learn more about hotels near the airport.

View ROA's current Arrivals and Departures.

Airlines Serving Roanoke-Blacksburg Regional Airport

Allegiant Air | Code: G4 | Reservations: (702) 505-8888 | www.allegiantair.com

American Airlines | Code: AA* | Reservations: (800) 433-7300 | www.aa.com

Delta | Code: DL* | Reservations: (800) 282-3424 | www.delta.com

United Airlines | Code: UA* | Reservations: (800) 864-8331 | www.ual.com

*Many flights at ROA are flown by the regional airline affiliates of the carriers listed.

Ground Transportation

There are a number of convenient ground transportation options for the Roanoke-Blacksburg Regional Airport. With easy interstate access and the airport being located just five miles from Downtown Roanoke, it takes almost no time to begin enjoying your visit to Virginia's Blue Ridge. The following are some helpful ground transportation resources when traveling to/from the airport, including a list of hotels that feature airport shuttle service.
